law.catch_line: The following disclosures shall be made in writing printed in 12 point type to any prospective membe...

text.section:
If a discount medical plan or a discount drug plan is sold, marketed, or solicited by telephone, the disclosures required by subsections (a) and (b) of this section shall be:
made orally; and
included with the membership card when mailed to the prospective plan member.
